A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Cheese and crackers\, you goobers. You complain about TFA because it's too similar\, then complain now that it's too different. I read one guy who said \"Even the prequel trilogy had HEART behind it.\" I just...what? What? Did we watch ANY of the same movies? Sorry you didn't get all your fanboy wish-fulfillment onscreen this time around\, but that's not how this works. It's been said before and it's true - \"The only people who hate Star Wars are Star Wars fans.\" Breeeeeathe\, just breeeeathe.
